metadata.description: Starting class definitions for character creation
metadata.note: All classes are selectable at character creation. Class can be switched later for a cost.

classes.name: Warrior
classes.description: Masters of combat and physical might. Warriors excel at dealing and taking damage in melee combat.
classes.narrative: Steel and strength. You are the immovable wall, the unstoppable force. When enemies see you, they know: their time has come.

startingSkill.description: Increases damage and attack speed temporarily in combat

classes.playstyle: Direct combat, high survivability, straightforward gameplay
strengths: High health pool for survivability
Bonus melee damage from the start
Extra inventory for carrying loot and supplies
Excellent for players who prefer straightforward combat
weaknesses: No mana for utility skills initially

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: Swift explorers and natural harvesters. Rangers move quickly and gather resources efficiently.
classes.narrative: The wilderness is your home. Trees fall faster before you, and you move like the wind. Nature bends to those who respect it.

startingSkill.description: Dramatically increases wood gathering speed for a short duration

strengths: Fastest movement speed for exploration
Bonus to forestry from the start
High critical hit chance for combat
Great for players who enjoy mobility and gathering
weaknesses: Relies on evasion rather than tanking

classes.name: Scholar
classes.description: Intellectuals who master alchemy and magical arts. Scholars excel at discovery and experimentation.
classes.narrative: Knowledge is power, and you wield both. Potions brew faster in your hands, recipes reveal themselves, and magic bends to your will.

startingSkill.description: Increases potion effectiveness and brewing speed

strengths: Large mana pool for magical skills
Discovers recipes faster than other classes
Gains skill experience 5% faster
Perfect for players who love experimentation

classes.name: Artisan
classes.description: Master crafters who excel at all creation disciplines. Artisans create better items faster.
classes.narrative: Your hands shape reality. What takes others hours, you complete in moments. What they craft once, you perfect instantly.

startingSkill.description: Increases smithing mini-game performance and quality

strengths: All crafting 10% faster from the start
10% higher chance at first-try bonuses
Items have 5% more durability
Ideal for players who love crafting systems

classes.name: Scavenger
classes.description: Lucky opportunists who find better loot and resources. Scavengers thrive on discovery.
classes.narrative: Where others see rocks, you see treasures. Fortune favors the prepared, and you are always prepared.

startingSkill.description: Temporarily increases rare drop rates and material quality

strengths: 20% better rare drop rates
10% better resource quality
100 bonus carry capacity for hoarding
Great for players who love collecting and exploring

classes.name: Adventurer
classes.description: Balanced generalists who dabble in everything. Adventurers have flexibility and choice.
classes.narrative: You are not confined by tradition or specialty. Every path is open, every skill within reach. You are limitless.

startingSkill.description: Player chooses ANY skill from the available skill pool to start with

strengths: Balanced HP and mana pools
5% bonus to all gathering activities
5% bonus to all crafting activities
Choice of starting skill for personalization
Perfect for players who want to explore everything
weaknesses: Master of none until late game

classSwitching.description: Players can switch classes at any time by paying a fixed cost
changedOnSwitch: Active class bonuses (old removed, new applied)

statDescriptions.STR: Strength - Increases melee damage and carry capacity
statDescriptions.VIT: Vitality - Increases max health and health regeneration
statDescriptions.AGI: Agility - Increases attack speed, crafting speed, and movement
statDescriptions.INT: Intelligence - Increases mana and magical effectiveness
statDescriptions.LCK: Luck - Improves drop rates, critical chance, and crafting outcomes

designNotes.balance: All numerical values are placeholders subject to balance testing
designNotes.classDiversity: Each class provides distinct starting advantages
designNotes.permanentProgression: Most progression is retained across class switches
